DOC.brief_summary: A study assess Effects MEDI4736 Patients With Locally Advanced Metastatic Non Small Cell Lung Cancer term efficacy , safety tolerability
DOC.brief_title: A Global Study Assess Effects MEDI4736 Patients With Locally Advanced Metastatic Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study design investigate efficacy , safety , tolerability new drug , MEDI4736 , patient Locally Advanced Metastatic Non Small Cell Lung Cancer . MEDI4736 investigate patient receive least two prior treatment regimen include one platinum-based chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Aged least 18 year . Documented evidence NSCLC ( stage IIIB/IV disease ) Disease progression recurrence platinumbased chemotherapy least 1 additional regimen treatment NSCLC World Health Organisation ( WHO ) Performance Status 0 1 Estimated life expectancy 12 week Patient 's tumour sample must PDL1 positive ( ≥25 % tumour cell membrane staining ( Cohort 1 2 ) PDL1 positive ≥90 % tumour cell membrane staining ( Cohort 3 ) ) Prior exposure antiPD1 antiPDL1 antibody Brain metastases spinal cord compression unless asymptomatic , treat stable ( require steroid ) . Active prior autoimmune disease history immunodeficiency Evidence severe uncontrolled systemic disease , include active bleeding diatheses active infection include hepatitis B , C HIV . Evidence uncontrolled illness symptomatic congestive heart failure , uncontrolled hypertension unstable angina pectoris . Any unresolved toxicity CTCAE > Grade 2 previous anticancer therapy . Any prior Grade ≥3 immunerelated adverse event ( irAE ) receive previous immunotherapy agent , unresolved irAE > Grade 1 Active prior document inflammatory bowel disease ( eg , Crohn 's disease , ulcerative colitis )
DOC.keyword: Locally advanced , metastatic , Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer , MEDI4736 , PD-L1
